longdesc.p: Displays an array of items tiled horizontally and vertically. The user can pan the list horizontally or vertically.
You want to use a data on different domain server, you need to check whether to support CORS(Cross Origin Resources Sharing) in the server.
If the server does not support CORS, virtualgrid would not work properly.

option.name: direction
option.desc: The axis along which the panning will take place. (note) Virtualgrid does not support both directions.

option.name: dataType
option.desc: This attribute indicates the type of the referenced data. It supports 'xml' or 'json'.

option.name: replaceHelper
option.desc: If user want to process more efficiently what replacing DOM, User should define a function and set a function name to this attribute.

event.name: create
event.desc: Triggered when a virtualgrid widget is created.

method.name: scrollTo
method.desc: Scroll to a certain set of coordinates.

signature.desc: Scrolls to the pair of coordinates specified by the parameters.

argument.name: x
argument.desc: The x-coordinate to which to scroll.

argument.name: y
argument.desc: The y-coordinate to which to scroll.

example.desc: A basic example of a page with a virtualgrid
